name: running-coach-landing
description: Running coach landing page with optimization tools

scripts.build:css: cleancss -o css/main.min.css css/main.css && cleancss -o css/main-en.min.css css/main-en.css
scripts.build:js: uglifyjs js/stats.js js/testimonials.js js/demo.js js/main.js -o js/main.min.js && uglifyjs js/stats-en.js js/testimonials-en.js js/demo-en.js js/main-en.js -o js/main-en.min.js
scripts.minify: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run gzip
